title: FS: T205 Marquard / Huggins / Merkle - All PSA Graded

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Marquard / Huggins / Merkle - All PSA Graded
posts.post_content:
The following cards are available with prices listed and scans below.

Miller Huggins, Piedmont Back (PSA 2) - $SOLD
Fred Merkle, Polar Bear Back (PSA 2.5) - $SOLD
Rube Marquard, Sweet Caporal Back (PSA 3) - $SOLD

Price includes shipping. Payment by PPFF or Checks Accepted. Please send a PM if you are interested.

Bump. 

Added back information per request and reduced prices.
